org.apache.pig.impl.util

Class StorageUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.pig.impl.util.StorageUtil

  • public final class StorageUtil
extends Object
    This util class provides methods that are shared by storage class PigStorage and streaming class PigStreaming
